name: Finda, Inc.
description: Operator of an online loan comparison platform intended to differentiate between various financial products. The company's platform collects information on financial products, recommends suitable products, and provides economic calculation services for housing loans, monthly savings, loan repayment purposes, mortgages, personal loans, and investments, enabling users to make informed financial decisions.
